Functions
isBlank
isBlank(
obj
)
Description

determines if submitted object exists and is not blank

getBlob
getBlob(
mime,
content,
filename
)
Description

This method will allow files to be saved from the CSTS app (file save dialog)

Parameters
mime

The mime type of the file to save

content

The data to be saved

filename

The name of the file to save asin

getGuid()
Description

d,
f,
s
) =>
Description

Recursively scans for files in a folder

Parameters
dir

The path being scanned

filelist

a file list to pass between recursive calls.  Not needed for initial call

msg
)
Description

Parameters

toggleHosts
toggleHosts()
Description

Shows or hides the hosts column of the CSTS application
